block.name: [CyberRadio] File-Like Object Source
block.doc:
The file_like_object_source block acts as a Python file-like \ object for text output from other blocks in the flowgraph. This text \ is collected and made available for streaming from the block's \ output.
To use this block, create a file_like_object_source object, and then \ use that object wherever a Python file-like object could be used to \ write output.
NOTE: The file_like_object_source object supports only the write() and \ flush() methods of file-like objects. It cannot be read from or \ searched.
